name: Cloud9 IDE
overview: Cloud9 IDE is a leading cloud-based Integrated Development Environment (IDE) that enables web and mobile developers to work together and collaborate in remote teams anywhere, anytime. Cloud9 IDE is an online development platform for Javascript and Node.js applications, that offers syntax highlighting support for HTML, CSS, PHP, Ruby, Python and 22 additional programming languages. Cloud9 IDE is open source, enabling developers to freely customize their environment according to their preference. Projects on Cloud9 are public and open sourced. Users who wish to have them remain private can upgrade to Cloud9 Premium for a low monthly fee.
